snippet: David Sweat’s statements to investigators, according to several people briefed on his account, have provided extraordinary detail of how he and another killer were able to escape from the Clinton Correctional Facility.
abstract: David Sweat, who in June escaped Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, along with inmate Richard Matt, has revealed to investigators details of exhaustive planning and execution that lead to breakout; Sweat's escape required patience, ingenuity and nightly explorations of prison's subterranean tunnels, as well as neglect on part of prison staff.
lead_paragraph: David Sweat’s statements to investigators, according to several people briefed on his account, have provided extraordinary detail of how he and another killer were able to escape from the Clinton Correctional Facility.

headline.main: New York Prisoner’s Keys to Escape: Lapsed Rules, Tools and Luck
headline.print_headline: Key to Escape: Lapsed Rules, Tools and Luck
